programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: Bonanza Bunny, Chariots Of Fur, Cat's Paw, Apes Of Wrath, Awful Orphan, The Bashful Buzzard, From Hare To Heir (1960)
programme.desc: "Bugs joins an 1896 gold town and duels a French-Canadian version of Yosemite Sam. , Wile E. Coyote and Road Runner do battle yet again. , Sylvester tries to help Junior get a cat's paw badge for hunting birds. , The stork makes a mistake when he delivers Bugs to an expecting gorilla family., Charlie Dog tries to take up home in Porky Pig's house and Porky goes through great lengths to get rid of him. , A bashful buzzard has a hard time keeping up with the rest of his siblings on bringing back food. , Yosemite Sam can keep a million dollar prize if he minds his temper – something Bugs is making very hard. "

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: West and Pike receive a note to meet a woman at a Chinese restaurant in San Francisco with a promise of information about the militant Din Chang who has recently stolen a supply of fulminate of mercury from a military arsenal. Unfortunately, the woman is killed before they can talk to her and the only word she utters is "Pelican." To further complicate matters, the only person they manage to capture is supposedly still serving time at Alcatraz. Since it seems that Alcatraz and the woman are the two pieces they have of the puzzle, the two split up to track down Chang before he can use the volatile mercury.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A Frenchman arouses strong---and polarized---emotions among the wagon train members: men distrust him, women adore him. He owes a substantial gambling debt and plans to pay it off by convincing a woman to pay it until he is killed."

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: A ranch hand who has gotten too old for regular saddle work is determined to catch a wild stallion to prove he is as capable as ever.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Tobe Hostader befriends a saloon girl whose ex-boyfriend is near.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Jamie falls in love with an unwanted Irish Setter, but he may not be able to save the animal's life because its rightful owner believes that the runt of the litter should always be destroyed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas hires an ex-con as a ranch hand, the man is the first one under suspicion when a robbery and murder occur in the area.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: An overbearing Favor leads to many drovers quitting. Five replacements stir trouble.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.sub-title: The Five Books Of Owen Deaver
programme.desc: Paladin comes to the aid of a young sheriff from Philadelphia whose attempts to keep law and order in are particularly unsuitable for a cowboy town in Wyoming.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: John Garth comes to town looking for his darling, Lil, because he feels something terrible has happened. There was a fire in the saloon and he thinks she may have died.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Three Dumb Clucks, No Census, How High Is Up, Crash Goes The Hash, Knutzy Knights, Pals And Gals, No Feeling
programme.desc: "Their father's plan to marry prompts the Stooges to break out of jail to save him from himself and, it turns out, from this intended dangerous posse. , The Stooges get jobs as census takers and wind up in a fancy mansion looking for people to survey. Moe and Larry are recruited to join a bridge game, while Curly adds Alum to the lemonade. The resulting concoction is consumed by everyone, resulting in puckered lips and shrunken clothes. The boys next try to take the census at a football stadium. They disguise themselves as players and wind up in the middle of the game. Curly runs off with the ball and all the other players in pursuit. , The Stooges are the 'Minute Menders', three tinkers who live under their car. The boys decide to drum up some business by punching holes in the unattended lunch boxes of some workmen. When they're caught in the act, they escape and accidentally get hired as riveters on a new building, working on the 97th floor. Their ineptitude and lousy workmanship screw up construction of the building and they must parachute off the building to escape the wrath of the boss. , The Stooges are hired as reporters and their first assignment is to get a picture of a visiting prince who is planning to marry a local socialite. The boys disguise as servants and infiltrate a party being in thrown in the honor of the prince. The Stooges ruin the party, but save the day as they expose the prince as crook who is planning to rob the house. Their boss is so grateful for the expose that he gives the boys a bonus and the rich lady decides to marry Curly! , Set in Elizabethan times, the Stooges help their friend Cedric the Blacksmith win the hand of the fair princess Elaine. The only problem is that Elaine is promised to the Black Prince who is plotting to take over the kingdom. The Stooges manage to foil the plot and the grateful King allows Cedric to marry Elaine. , The Stooges go out west for Shemp's health. The boys soon run afoul of a local villain who is forcing pretty Nell to marry him. The bad guy has Nell's sisters locked up, and its up to the Stooges to rescue them and save the day. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "The Wolfman tries to help foil Dracula's attempts to transfer Lou's brain into the ailing Frankenstein monster."

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Joker returns to commit what appear to be senseless crimes, until he captures the Maharajah of Nimpah. Later, Batman and Robin are trapped inside a chimney with deadly gas.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Kirk pits the Enterprise against an invisible spaceship testing the Federation's defenses.

programme.title: Adventures of Superman
programme.desc: A racketeer gets Kryptonite from a fallen meteor but mistakes Clark's friend Gary Allen for Superman.

programme.title: Adventures of Superman
programme.desc: Gangsters use a machine to become invisible and execute mysterious robberies.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: An alien boy is sent to Priplanis to validate his prince status. Will is drawn into a battle to the death unbeknownst to his father. When his real intentions are learned, John substitutes himself in the challenge and the alien ruler substitutes himself for his son.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: Nelson and Commander Crane are subjects of an experiment in which they are ordered to kill each other.

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: After an air balloon accident, the castaways drift to the other side of the planet where they find a society run by a dictator, oblivious to their existence. Now, Steve must prove life on the other side of the planet or the castaways will die by his hand.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: In 1519, Tony and Doug vow to slow down Cortez's conquest of Mexico.

programme.title: The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams
programme.desc: "Adams and Mad Jack take in 2 orphan children, Michele and Eugene. While the kids are grateful at first, soon they become bored by following rules. Secretly, they later wander off to find some fun but it may endanger them both."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "A valley in the mountain country of the western United States is the territory of the Golden Eagle, America’s largest and most powerful bird of prey. Marlin and Jim locate an eyrie (nest) of this magnificent bird, and build a blind high on a rocky cliff so they can photograph its nesting habits. Humor and drama are interwoven as the young eagle, in his search for food, follows a skunk into his den…and later finds out that a fast dive at a sitting duck results in his first unwanted bath. His territory is invaded by a forest fire, and the hunting is made easier as the other animals of the valley flee the flames. He is trapped by man in a scientific experiment, but later released to continue his life in the “Valley of Eagles.”"

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Oddities of animal motion include mammals that fly, birds that climb with their shoulders, lizards that dive and snakes that travel sideways."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "A horseback safari into the wilds of Rhodesia where Marlin Perkins and Jim Fowler explore the vast grasslands, rivers and forests and observe an amazing variety of rare animals. In this episode, the forming waters swirl around tons of struggling hippo in a dangerous project to tranquilize and capture one of the largest members of the wild kingdom."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Man loves speed and this episode answers some of the most pertinent inquiries as to what animals hold the records."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "In the wild kingdom each animal owns a territory…and one animal rules every habitat. A visit to each domain reveals why each is called a Monarch of the Wild."

programme.title: Mutual of Omaha's Wild Kingdom
programme.desc: "Of all the behemoths that once roamed the earth, only the elephant is left for us to marvel about. And marvel we should for here’s an animal that weights 10 tons, yet leaves an imprint only a half-inch deep when walking on soft sand…can eat 200 pounds of hay a day, drink 50 gallons of water at one go, grow to be 13 feet tall at the shoulder, yet can use its trunk so delicately it can pick a flower off the ground without crushing it. But many questions about this animal remain unanswered. By literally living with a family of elephants in Bechuanaland, Africa, we observe their fascinating life."

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Cindy comes home in tears after a bully, Buddy Hinton, begins picking on her because of her lisp. One afternoon, Peter encounters Buddy teasing Cindy and defends her, but gets a black eye in the process. Mike and Carol try to reason with Buddy's parents but get nowhere, and Peter goes into training so he can defend himself against Buddy.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: Jan has been smitten with Clark Tyson and they've been studying together. However, when Marcia casually, steps in the family room, Clark is instantly smitten. Jan becomes insecure about her looks and seeks out ways to get rid of her freckles. However, later, not wanting people to feel sorry for her, Jan makes up an imaginary boyfriend, George Glass.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie is invited to a socialite dinner party, not knowing that the people who have invited him hope he will make a fool of himself.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: When Laverne and Shirley unwittingly double-date with two criminals intent on robbing the bank next to the Pizza Bowl, the girls find themselves being held as hostages.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Grumpy businessman Ben Weaver insists that Andy foreclose on a down-on-his-luck neighbor.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: After Ricky is featured in Life Magazine, Lucy is more desperate than ever for a showbiz career. To prevent it, Ricky and Fred concoct an impossible dance routine for her. She gets back at them by upstaging Ricky during his own big number.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver makes a trade with Larry Mondello, a glass doorknob for a chihuahua. Larry had found the dog in his garbage can, so when Beaver brings it home, Ward immediately breaks the news that he's going to place an ad in the lost-and-found and that Beaver probably won't be able to keep the dog. Despite this, Beaver quickly begins to grow close to the little dog.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward helps Beaver and Wally build a miniature race car powered by the lawn mower motor, and Ward makes the boys promise not to use it without his supervision. Later, Larry talks Beaver into taking it for a spin, resulting in the boys being pulled over by a traffic officer.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A confidence man tries to sell Jed the Hollywood Bowl, Griffith Park and the Hollywood Freeway.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed is made a bank vice president so he can compete in an interbank skeet shoot.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The Professor determines that the lack of vitamin C on the island threatens the health of the castaways.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A radio bulletin states that the minister who married the Howell's was a fraud.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Mama's dreams predict winning horses at the races.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: Vint judges a chili cook-off between Mama, Naomi and Iola.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A man offers the crew $10,000 to find him a wife; a girl must confront her former love; a man tries to dump his assistant for a blonde.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney is suspicious of Mayberry's mysterious new farmer (William Schallert).

programme.title: Collector's Call
programme.desc: "Collector Zespy oddball collection of the quirkiest robots ever assembled range in size from the tiny, Telecoma action figures from Japan that transform into licensed food products, to the life-sized, a fully functional animatronic canine rock band. Lisa's brought along pop-culture appraiser and auctioneer Mike Boerschinger to put a value on Zespy's collection, after which Mike will try to tempt him into a trade."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: As Hawkeye and Trapper are planning to leave for Tokyo, an unusual offer to swap POW patients between the Chinese and the 4077th comes in. Henry, after much debate, agrees to send Hawkeye, Trapper, Frank, Radar and Klinger into enemy territory. Frank almost botches the swap when he brings a squirt gun to the exchange. Fortunately, the Chinese Dr. Lin Tam has a sense of humor.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: While Henry is away in Seoul, Burns and Houlihan are in charge, and Hawkeye is the officer of the day. His refusal to release a wounded Korean soldier, wanted by US Intelligence, leads to a confrontation with Colonel Flagg.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Archie's self-esteem takes a beating when he loses his job on the loading dock.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: A college grad threatens to commit suicide after he loses a jaintor's job to Archie.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Archie's trip to the hospital is an ethnic nightmare. He's admitted by a Puerto Rican receptionist, treated by a Jewish physician, and is forced to accept a blood transfusion from a black doctor.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Archie recuperates in record time after he's called back to work-with a raise and a promotion.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray joins a Civil War re-enactment.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray's thrilled to finally meet a relative whom the whole family likes.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Rob has two days to find 44 tickets to "The Alan Brady Show" promised to the PTA.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Rob surprises Laura with a necklace that she secretly hates.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph hurts his back at a bowling tournament the night before his physical exam.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Columnist Jordan Herrick is startled to learn that a famous movie actress hasn't aged in years. Intrigued, he investigates—and soon learns a terrifying secret.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A successful jewelry shop owner sells a rare black pearl to a wealthy client.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Two old college friends meet again after a long separation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Alex Pierson, a rising Syndicate member, has recruited Dr. Burke, a psychopathic behavioral psychologist who has developed a way to program men into killers. Pierson lures in underworld criminals with an offer of plastic surgery and turns them over to Burke.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: While working as a steward at a remote desert resort, Kimble is unaware that the area is a top-secret government test site for chemical weapons. Kimble tries to leave, but gets mistaken for a spy by Major Beck, the head of the project.

programme.title: Harry O
programme.desc: "When private investigator Harry Orwell is hired to investigate medical malpractice, he finds himself involved in organized crime and murder."

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A shooting case exemplifies how the police gather—and why they must sometimes withhold—evidence.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday investigates a woman's claim that her husband is an armed robber.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and reed report to a disturbance at a night club caused by a young folk singer whose career has been derailed by drug addiction and contends that she is being threatened with death by the manager who is a member of a large drug ring. Reed agrees to

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: "Bandits using tear gas and a unique escape route rob an armored truck at a savings and loan."

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill & Toony explore the history of game shows with a special guest!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: While playing baseball in the street with Wally, Chester and Tooey, Eddie hits a baseball through the Cleaver's window resulting in Ward forbidding the boys to play baseball so close to the house. However, later, Beaver talks Wally into pitching one, and this results in a broken car window.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: After a week-long visit with their Aunt Martha, Wally and Beaver prepare to head home to Mayfield on a train. After talking Martha into letting them buy their own tickets, they discover they're short the money after spending it on junk food and find themselves wondering how they are going to get home.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Dubious Bridegroom
programme.desc: Mason returns to his office late one night and finds an attractive woman climbing into his balcony window. She claims to be Virginia Colfax, the secretary of Ed Garvin, who has an office next door to Mason's.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock reluctantly agrees to defend millionaire Ellis Blake when he's accused of murdering his daughter's fiancé, Jeffrey Holden, a blackmailing golf caddy.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: A lawyer has personal reasons for trying to gain early release for a man who was sent to prison after an accident he caused while drinking and driving.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A soldier in Jason's company is Jewish. He tells the Waltons what is happening to Jews by the Nazis

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Elmo Sippy may seem polite on the outside, but he's a murderer on the inside.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Jamie falls in love with the abused wife of an unpopular Virginia City schoolmaster.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas finds himself involved in murder when he gallantly steps to the aid of a beautiful woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An ex-convict is blamed for a brutal crime despite his claims of rehabilitation.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Flint stops in a saloon with Bill and Charlie where he learns the whereabouts of a man he's been hunting for years---to kill. Bill has to restrain Flint who lapses into recalling his fiancé Nancy Lee Davis and his search for her killer."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: John and Roy bring in a football player who was tackled too hard. A burglar has a heart attack. John wants Roy to apologize for calling him "some kind of nut." Dr. Early treats a hypochondriac. A babysitter brings in a child who has swallowed some pills. Roy and John rescue the occupants of a light plane that crashed in a tree.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: General 'Iron Guts' Kelly arrives for an inspection, and ends up dying in Margaret's tent. Hawkeye and Trapper help the General's aide smuggle him out of camp. The next day he is reported killed at the front, as that is where he would have wanted to die.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The O.R. is filled with more wounded than the unit can handle. Hawkeye does heart massage on a soldier, which saves his life, but he dies four hours later. Sidney Freedman drops in during the deluge, and is dragged into the fray by Hawkeye.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: When spring arrives, Klinger gets word from home that his sweetheart back in Toledo wants to marry him. Henry arranges for Father Mulcahy to do this over short wave radio. Radar falls in love with a nurse, while a grateful patient won't leave Hawkeye alone, and even threatens Major Burns.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Trapper gets an ulcer and a ticket home. Unfortunately, his going-away party is spoiled by a new Army regulation, which forces him to stay.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: An escaped convict vows revenge on the man who sent him back to prison: none other than Deputy Barney Fife.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Mayberry guitarist Jim Lindsey (James Best), a success as a solo artist, returns to a hero's welcome. However, Andy suspects trouble.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra gets upset when Raymond chooses his mother's cooking over hers.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Raymond takes over the checkbook to prove to Debra how "easy it can be" to balance it.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan tries to keep a fortune in paintings from winding up in the collection of a general.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan plans to send German defenses to the wrong target by "giving" Schultz ESP so that the Allies can bomb an important target.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Cheating Chancellor
programme.desc: Mason returns to his college alma mater to receive an award, but there's no rest for the weary when he's called upon to defend Van Fowler for the murder of a professor.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A cheating husband sees his secret revealed and its horrible consequences on his just-repaired TV set.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A husband searches desperately for his wife in a neighborhood where numerous murders have been committed.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man's plan to leave his wife takes a turn he didn't foresee.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix goes undercover as a heroin addict to discover who's trying to kill an old friend.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "A private detective investigates the murder of his ex-girlfriend's husband and gets entangled in small-town corruption."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A man attempting suicide is really a diversion for a jewelry heist.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon confront a phony magazine salesperson.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: It's a job half done when police nab a narcotics manufacturer: they still need his backer.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy is told that the best player on the recreational league basketball team he coaches has begun using narcotics again, which he flatly denies despite evidence to the contrary. He and Reed also search for a hit-and-run driver who struck a child, and pull over a driver with a seemingly disrespectful and wanted passenger.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed investigate the ransacking of a college football locker room and uncover a controversial performance enhancing drug program. They also investigate suspicious parents who backtrack after their maid reports their baby as missing, apprehend a reported prowler who is then suspiciously let into the home by the female accuser and engage in a bullet-riddled high speed chase through a residential area.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony revisit the roaring 20s with a special performance by the Windy City Ramblers."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: An 8th grade dance has Wally being pressured into attending with a girl, instead of going stag with Eddie. However, Mary Ellen Rogers becomes determined to have Wally take her and goes through Beaver to get to him.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wanting to be liked by Wally's friends, Beaver makes up a wild story about the vacant lot next to his house being an Indian battle ground. After making a bet with Eddie, Beaver has Wally help him plant artifacts in the lot. However, that is forgotten when the kids make a discovery that they believe will make them rich.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Lame Canary
programme.desc: Ruth Prescott wants to divorce Walter Prescott so she can be with her true love, Jimmy MacLaine. After a brush with death, Ruth becomes convinced that Walter is trying to kill her, but then Walter turns up dead.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock flies to England to represent Eric Gordon, a man accused of murdering his wealthy businessman father. While his sister is convinced of his innocence, his brother isn't so sure.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Harriet and Eugene are devastated after Gene's father is arrested for murder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: There is a new teacher at school who is fun and modern.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A grief-stricken widower gets a job as a hired hand for two sisters.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When Candy is framed for robbery and manslaughter, his fate rests in the hands of a confident yet inexperienced attorney.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is out for vengeance when Mark is used as a pawn in a bank robbery scheme.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas shoots a horse thief who turns out to be a member of the Boyle clan, and now Ma Boyle is after him.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Duke's resemblance to gambler Jason Carter makes him the target for a murderer's bullet when he visits Jason Carter's hometown looking for supplies. Jason has been missing for five years and only one man knows the truth about him."

programme.desc: Roy and John rescue a man whose engine has fallen on him during his car repair work.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Mail from home worries Henry that Lorraine may be seeing other men. Father Mulcahy presides over a Jewish circumcision ceremony for the Korean-born son of a US GI.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Henry's departure to Tokyo leaves Major Burns in charge of the 4077th. He declares total prohibition of alcohol, which leads to a near riot in the camp.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.sub-title: There Is Nothing Like A Nurse
programme.desc: The nurses are evacuated when the threat of an enemy parachute drop arises. Hawkeye and Trapper try to enliven everyone's spirits while they are gone.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Sick and tired of having liver and fish for an 11-day stretch, Hawkeye, driven near to insanity, starts a riot in the mess tent. He and Trapper then orders spare ribs and sauce from his favorite barbecue joint—in Chicago.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee, believing that the jailhouse environment is adversely affecting Opie, forbids the lad to spend time at work with Andy.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan gets a stray chimpanzee to deliver radio parts to the underground.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes

programme.desc: The owner of a mountain lodge asks Barnaby to prove he didn't kill his wife, even though his guests swear they saw him do it.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Working with the slimmest of leads, police attempt to identify a woman's body.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: An undercover cop is left in a coma after being shot while investigating a potential attack by a youth gang on an elders' association in chinatown, but his girlfriend refuses to disclose time critical information to malloy and reed on orders from her powe

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: On temporary assignment at LAX, Reed and Malloy have to save a stewardess who is taken hostage inside a lounge by a man desperately trying to get the attention of a television producer. programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony make their own claymation film and examine the history of stop-motion animation."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: After a weekend spent at the movies goes awry for Ward, he decides the boys should spend their weekends outside and plans a camping trip. However, when Ward's called into work, Wally and Beaver decide to camp out in the backyard.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally makes the baseball team and Ward openly shows how proud he is of him, leaving Beaver feeling inferior. Trying to impress his parents, Beaver tries out for the band and begins practicing the clarinet. However, Beaver soon finds himself with more problems when he's let go from the band.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Spurious Sister
programme.desc: Bruce Chapman returns home early from a business trip to find that his wife, Marie, wants a divorce. Chapman is shocked at this turn of events because he thought his wife had recently been strangled to death.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock flies to England to represent Eric Gordon, a man accused of murdering his wealthy businessman father. While his sister is convinced of his innocence, his brother isn't so sure.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sweet is heartbroken when an elderly woman who befriended him is murdered in her bookstore.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jeffrey and Josh steal from Ike's store and Josh gets caught.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Quint guides a family on a hazardous trail to Oregon.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Griff poses as Theodora Duffy, the "wife" of a government agent in order to nab a group of war criminals.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Seven condemned murderers escape and take over the town of North Fork.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark finds gold on their property, a fast-talking salesman who tried to sell Lucas a new lightning rod offers instead to buy the ranch's mineral rights.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Bill and Charlie looking for horses help out an old friend John Turnbull (an Ute lawyer) defend his reservation against local land sharks who look to initiate a range war so the army will push the local residents off their land."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: The station adopts a stray dog, which they name Boot. The firemen rescue a boy from a hole; he turns out to be an abused child. Roy and John rescue another boy whose head is stuck in a basement window. Dr. Early extracts a child's arm from a steering wheel. At a brush fire, Boot helps locate an injured hiker, and then leaves with a hook and ladder truck.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye records a letter to his dad, detailing the exploits of a mad Turkish soldier who calls Hawkeye a "damn good Joe," the unfortunate loss of the corpse of a Luxembourg soldier (who turns out not to be dead), Lt. Henri-Batiste LeClerc and a gun-happy officer.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A local dog bites Radar, and the camp conducts a search to find the pooch so that Radar doesn't have to undergo a series of painful rabies vaccinations. Hawkeye defies Frank, to take care of a GI who's suffering from a case of hysterical paralysis.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A Greek Colonel thanks the 4077th by giving them food and drink for an Easter celebration. But the feast is foiled when softhearted Radar saves the main course from the spit—a lamb, which Radar tricks Henry into giving a medical discharge and sends home to Ottumwa, Iowa. Thus, Hawkeye and Trapper invent the famed Spam Lamb!

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The camp is under fire and is swamped with wounded. They are being attacked by their own artillery in a frightening "friendly fire" incident. After Trapper and Margaret get trapped in the supply tent together, Frank's jealousy of Trapper drives him to propose to Margaret.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney believes that Andy is grooming a new man to replace him as deputy.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A stubborn but charming lady speeder makes life difficult for Andy.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra discovers that Marie, likes Robert's girlfriend, Amy, better.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra brings an "unapproved snack" to Ally's T-ball game.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Clearance Sale At The Black Market
programme.desc: After seeing something he shouldn't have, Schultz is ordered to the Russian front.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan leads Klink to believe a rabbit trap is a secret electronic device in order for Klink to bring an electronics expert, who wants to defect, to camp.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.sub-title: Guests Tim Conway And Eydie Gorme (part 2)
programme.desc: "Guests Tim Conway and Eydie Gorme. Originally aired on 03/01/72."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Carefree Coronary
programme.desc: The Safeline Insurance Company notices an increase in heart attacks among their policy holders. The company suspects fraud and hires Mason and Paul to investigate.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist's dummy goads him into committing burglaries.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man makes a deal with a friend to keep from having to pay his wife alimony.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man decides to demonstrate to his new girlfriend how he gets his kicks.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: When the daughter of one of Mannix's friends is kidnapped, the captors demand that the man lose a large sum of money in a card game as her ransom.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Frank Cannon is called in to investigate a robbery and murder of six people at a rodeo. The police had come up with nothing after six weeks except for the knowledge that there was a film taken of the rodeo at the day of the crime. Cannon believes that there is a possibility that the rodeo clowns may have played a part in the crime and must now learn where the clown suit came from.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby suspects that a desert rancher's death was no accident.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Other people's credit cards are found in the possession of a forest ranger.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday arrests a member of his class for possession of marijuana.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: While transporting a burglar to the station with Malloy's assistance, Sgt. MacDonald strikes and kills a jaywalker with his cruiser, but unfortunately all of the witnesses on the sidewalk inexplicably claim she was in the crosswalk. With the burglar unmotivated to testify on MacDonald's behalf, Malloy has to take it upon himself to clear his boss.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and reed try to curb a chronic street racing problem by befriending the club leaders and working with a racing promoter to open a legitimate drag strip. Their efforts, along with a highly anticipated race between reed and officer wells, are put in

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: June has Wally stay home from school when he comes down with a sore throat and suddenly Wally is immersed in attention from his parents, friends and doctor. Jealous and feeling left out, Beaver fakes illness, seeking that same attention.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally and Beaver are helping Ward clean out the garage when they run across Beaver's old teddy bear, Billy. Beaver reluctantly throws him away after Ward and Wally tell him he's too old for dolls. However, Beaver changes his mind but he's too late: the garbage truck came, which leads Beaver to take drastic measures to get him back.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Watery Witness
programme.desc: Lorna Thomas is a has-been actress who once gave up her baby for adoption and lived to regret it. George Clark discovers that his wife might be Lorna's long-lost daughter and begins to see dollar signs.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock retires from law after bungling up a case. He heads out of town to do some fishing, but after a hitchhiker he encounters dies mysteriously, Matlock decides to stick around and investigate.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Virgil's dream of a better relationship with his Aunt Ruda and her son is shattered when his cousin takes part in a string of burglaries that result in murder.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Zadok Walton visits the mountain. He seems eccentric, but turns out he is held in esteem by Boatwright University for his work

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: After a man gets beaten up for trying to steal a horse, he plots his revenge.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A game of cat and mouse ensues when outlaw Bill Tanner steals the goods Joe is transporting on his wagon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Micah is badly injured by an escaping prisoner, Lucas tracks the prisoner back to his home town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When an outlaw leader lures Marshal Torrance out of town, Lucas is the only one who can stop him from lynching a local man who killed one of the members of his gang.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Duke quits the wagon train to take up a steady position as Deputy Indian Agent at San Marcos on an Apache reservation under Hiram Winthrope. Hiram is an Easterner with ideas of teaching the nomadic Apache to become farmers."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: A photo shoot at the station gets John excited. A country doctor helps Roy and John when they can't reach Rampart on a call. The paramedics rescue a man drowning in a swimming pool and two stuntmen trapped on a waterfall at a movie studio.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Camp activities include Henry's nervous delivery of a sex lecture, with Hawkeye and Trapper heckling, a Shirley Temple movie and a cookout.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Dr. Borelli visits the 4077th to demonstrate his artery transplant technique. Unfortunately, being so close to the front at the 4077th causes Borelli's drinking problem to interfere at the worst time—when a patient needs the transplant.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye hits Major Burns and Houlihan is a witness. Despite Hawkeye and Trapper's claims that it wasn't intentional, Frank makes allegations against Hawkeye, and he is put in house arrest facing court martial. A female colonel is sent to inspect the nurses. When she cries "Rape!" when Burns visits her tent, Houlihan recants her story, and Burns, not Hawkeye, ends up under house arrest.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye, Houlihan and Klinger go to an aid station at the front. Working closely together under heavy fire and unsanitary medical conditions, the three return to camp with new found respect for one another.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Frank Myers is about to get evicted by the city council when he discovers an old bond that the city of Mayberry issued 100 years ago. Mayberry now owes him $350,000 and can't pay.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: After a tiff with Thelma Lou, Barney is victimized by a scheming young couple.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert's students complain that his class causes severe insomnia.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra tries to teach Raymond how to have a "normal" mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: After Klink finds Sergeant Schultz drunk he gets a tough new replacement.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Hogan's Trucking Service... We Deliver The Factory To You
programme.desc: Colonel Crittendon shows up again and messes up Hogan's plans to destroy a ball bearing plant.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.desc: "Family Sketch Show. Originally aired on 03/29/72."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Hasty Honeymooner
programme.desc: Lucas Tolliver arrives in California from Oklahoma to meet the woman he was matched up with by a computer dating service. The woman, Miliicent Barton, is supposedly a rich widow.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A former KGB officer trying to defect finds himself trapped in a room with a bomb—and three hours before it detonates.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman strives to keep her brother from running her life.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A crazy man holds a woman hostage in her farmhouse while he plans his escape from the area.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: One might think that after waking from a year-long coma, the worst would be in the past. But that is not true for Mannix's client, injured in a hit-and-run accident and now the target of killers.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: The death of a bank manager's mistress leads Cannon into a case of murder and betrayal.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A race-car driver murders his brother-in-law, then stages a smashup to cover it up.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a complaint that two veteran officers stole funds.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday investigates a woman's claim that her husband is an armed robber.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed search for a six-year-old boy who was apparently abducted while walking home from school, and later fear that an elderly witness's wildly inaccurate account may actually pertain to a different crime. They also respond to a barking dog complaint and become suspicious of the dog's owner, mediate a domestic dispute caused by a husband's obsession with watching football, respond to a very creative college prank and pursue armed robbery suspects through a crowded train depot with the aid of a police helicopter.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed becomes preoccupied with the well being of a friend, an electrical engineer by profession, who has just qualified as a reserve police officer and has the bad luck of drawing Officer Wells as his partner. On patrol, Reed and Malloy help out a group of distrusting young adults who are planning to illegally camp in a public park after a rock concert, pull over a young couple in a stolen car and aid wells and the reservist in the foot chase of a heavily armed man who has been coercing innocent strangers into committing bank robberies.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony journey through the state of Oklahoma."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally jumps at the chance to paint a couple of garbage cans for Ward, who offers 50 cents a piece. However, when Eddie tells Wally that his father was charged $3.00 to have his painted, he becomes disinterested in the job and Beaver takes it over.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: An incident at the park leads to Beaver ripping the pants on his gray flannel suit. When he's questioned by Ward and June he makes up a wild story that his parents quickly see through. Lectured in telling the truth, Beaver does just that when the pants of his other suit are ripped but Ward and June don't believe him.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Garrulous Gambler
programme.desc: Larry Benton is a hard-luck guy. He gets in an argument in a poker game and knocks Mike Granger out cold. Then he is informed him that Granger is dead.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock retires from law after bungling up a case. He heads out of town to do some fishing, but after a hitchhiker he encounters dies mysteriously, Matlock decides to stick around and investigate.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie receives word that a former Spartan is wanted for the murder of a socialite in Houston. But a ruthless bounty hunter, sent by the victim's jealous husband is already in Sparta and sees the man's sister as a means to locate his quarry.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mamie Balwin has a cataract, but does not want an operation

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: An ex-convict comes to Dodge with the intention of shooting Matt dead.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights have to protect their land from ruthless mine owners who want the Ponderosa for its timber. They enlist the aid of actress Lotta Crabtree to carry out their plans, but she soon learns that she's getting into more than she bargained for.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A former army captain comes to North Fork to kill the man who shot down his son in a gunfight—Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A new store owner upsets the town by demanding that all credit accounts be paid off.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "Chris Hale has dinner with a society matron whose carriage team he had stopped after being spooked. A rival for the woman's attention is Chris' first problem while the crew's attempt to sabotage their relationship is the second one."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: A sick lady with a monkey provides the key to a mysterious, highly contagious and deadly virus that strikes both Dr. Brackett and John. Meanwhile, the firemen rescue a boy from a treehouse and a man from a scaffold.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Trapper prevent a GI from marrying a call girl who has TB, while trying to help a Korean soldier join his pregnant wife. Radar, of course, provides his usual invaluable help.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: The camp prepares for a visit from General MacArthur. Klinger dresses as the Statue of Liberty as the General's jeep drives through the camp. MacArthur is so impressed, he salutes!

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On payday, Frank buys two sets of pearls, a cheap imitation one for Margaret and a real one for his wife. After some talk, Radar gets Hawkeye $3,000 in lost earnings, Hawkeye gives it to Mulcahy for the orphans, but then the army wants the money back. Trapper wins big at poker after using Hawkeye's watch as a stake, so Hawkeye takes his winnings and gives them to the army to avoid a stay in the honeymoon suite of The Stockade Hilton.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Colonel Flagg blows into camp trying to obtain penicillin to barter for information. But Flagg comes down with appendicitis, and the only penicillin he gets is in the keister.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A ne'er-do-well vagrant has a bad influence on Opie.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy and Barney are honored for achieving the lowest crime-rate in the country.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Raymond and Debra take a walk back in time -- to the very beginning.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray fears that Debra is more interested in the wedding than in him.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: The Gestapo gets three beautiful girls to pry secrets out of the guys.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: Man's Best Friend Is Not His Dog
programme.desc: A dog buries a bone containing film from Carter's camera that has images of a new German tank.

programme.title: The Carol Burnett Show
programme.desc: "Family Sketch Show. Originally aired on 03/29/72."

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Burt Payne coaches and owns 10% of a professional football team. His rich wife, Ellen, owns the remainder. Knowing that he's washed up and needing some quick cash, Burt tries to sell his share of the team to a group of investors.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Having had a little too much to drink the night before, a young couple wakes up in a strange house in a strange town called Centerville, a place where no one lives, the trees are props and the food is plastic.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A shocking surprise awaits a woman who is about to meet her favorite star.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.sub-title: The Right Kind Of A House
programme.desc: A woman schemes to avenge her son's death with a unique plan.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Syndicate thugs have kidnapped an informer—or so they believe. Their victim is actually Peggy Fair, Mannix's secretary, which puts the detective on their trail.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Cannon goes undercover as a truck driver to investigate a series of hijackings.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Barnaby is on the hunt for a psychopathic murderer.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe has purchased the winning raffle ticket for a new TV. The only problem? Kate has the ticket, and she's on jury duty.
